title: Resolve Negative Inventory
description: A system report shows a negative on-hand quantity for an item, which is physically impossible. An inventory controller must investigate and correct it.

tasks.description: Identify the item with negative inventory from a system alert.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the problematic SKU.

tasks.description: Review the item's transaction history to find the cause of the error.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent discovers a shipment was received against the wrong PO, causing this item's inventory to go negative when it was shipped.

tasks.description: Re-receive the shipment against the correct PO, which resolves the negative inventory balance.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inventory levels are now correct.
